name: 3D Rad Project File
summary: Learn about .3DR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: 3DR project files can be compiled into either standalone executables or applets that can be embedded into webpages. Therefore, 3D Rad projects are used for both Windows and web browser games.
3D Rad projects support many other game features, including animation, artificial intelligence, visual effects, cameras and view modes, and custom scripting.

description: A 3DR file is a project file created by 3D Rad, a free application used to create 3D games. It contains a 3D scene with objects and their properties. It also contains links between objects, which allows them to interact with physical constraints.
